Test Instructions:

  1. Open the enhanced handouts in a web browser
  2. Scroll down to see the "Educational Videos" section
  3. Test video playback by clicking play on any video
  4. Try the print function - videos should be hidden
  5. Test on mobile devices for responsiveness
  6. Verify captions are available (CC button)
